price: (Waardiyaa ibiddaatiin) “yaa Maalik! Gooftaan kee haa nufixu (nuuf gaafadhuu)” (jedhanii) lallabu. (Maalikis) “isin ishee keessa turoodha” jedhe.
arabic: وَنَادَوۡاْ يَٰمَٰلِكُ لِيَقۡضِ عَلَيۡنَا رَبُّكَۖ قَالَ إِنَّكُم مَّٰكِثُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wanādaw yāmāliku liyaqḍi ʿalaynā rabbuka qāla innakum mākithūna
